long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flatini - a chrome extension that helps you find together the perfect place üè†

Finding a flat in London is excruciating, we've come up with Flatini to make it way easier. 

Use our chrome extension when you're looking for potential flats to add them to your list. You can create a group with whoever you will be sharing a flat with and add them to the group, so you can all see when a flat has been added to the list or not.

Simple, yet so cool. No more sending dozens of links on WhatsApp, easily keep track of the flats you like in our extension.
